Compile India | Bangalore, India | Full-Time | Onsite

Come build [our API](http://v2.compileapi.com/docs/) that will feed the next wave of intelligent software. Work on data, specifically dynamic and contextual business data.

Our product is a Knowledge graph for Organizations and our customers are software vendors and analytic tools who directly integrate our data for their customers to use. We have been self-funded and profitable since our inception. You will get to work with smart people and work on a product that people actually pay for. We won't bullshit you or make promises we have no intention of keeping. You will get freedom to go down paths less travelled and we will work with you to challenge yourself.

Technologies and skills we each use: Django, Django REST framework, Slate, Postgres, AWS, Angular, React, Pandas, Docker, Nightmare js

If this excites you, drop us a line at careers@compile.com
